sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>Launch reject alert</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_2']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>0222c675514a4210d58411b90dbaaf62</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch reject alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0222c675514a4210d58411b90dbaaf62</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4222c675a94a421003972385d76a3261
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">ca22c6756c4a421057bbf3835b47c478</macroponent><name>Set Related item sysId</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Tasks">c222c675ef4a42107f372b2676b09065</macroponent><name>Task Approve/Reject</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const approveOrReject = event.elementId;
    if (approveOrReject == 'button_2') {
        const approveFileds =
            `state=approved`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.state.taskApproveSysId,
            'templateFields': approveFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
        // const modal_payload = {
        //     "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_1']",
        //     "showModal": true,
        //     "displayOptions": null
        // };
        // const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        // helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
        //     api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
        // }, 500);
    } else if (approveOrReject == 'button_1') {
        const rejectedFileds =
            `state=rejected`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.state.taskRejectedSysId,
            'templateFields': rejectedFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
        // const modal_payload = {
        //     "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_2']",
        //     "showModal": true,
        //     "displayOptions": null
        // };
        // const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        // helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
        //     api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
        // }, 500);
    }
    // helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
    //     api.data.evam_mytasks.refresh();
    // }, 500);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>0e22c675574a42103760c795e8d2b565</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task Approve/Reject</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0e22c675574a42103760c795e8d2b565</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">ca22c6756c4a421057bbf3835b47c478</macroponent><name>Order success redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        payload: params
    } = event;
    const route = "order_success";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>8222c675044a42104785644c52087566</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Order success redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8222c675044a42104785644c52087566</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:18</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8e22c675d14a42107d52f04dc7032269
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>Request page redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    const table = "task";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_2.result.task.value;
        if (state.producedRecordSysId && sysId) {
            api.setState("producedRecordSysId","");  
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "record_request",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>8e22c675d14a42107d52f04dc7032269</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8e22c675d14a42107d52f04dc7032269</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0a22c675314a4210b7c2bc32acc1146c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>Task Approve/Reject</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const approveOrReject = event.elementId;
    if (approveOrReject == 'button_6') {
        const approveFileds =
            `state=approved`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.state.taskApproveSysId,
            'templateFields': approveFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
        const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_1']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
            api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
        }, 500);
    } else if (approveOrReject == 'button_8') {
        const rejectedFileds =
            `state=rejected`;
        api.data.update_record_1.execute({
            'table': 'sysapproval_approver',
            'recordId': api.state.taskRejectedSysId,
            'templateFields': rejectedFileds,
            'useSetDisplayValue': ''
        });
        const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_2']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
            api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
        }, 500);
    }
    helpers.timing.setTimeout(() => {
        api.data.evam_mytasks.refresh();
    }, 500);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>0a22c675314a4210b7c2bc32acc1146c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Task Approve/Reject</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0a22c675314a4210b7c2bc32acc1146c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Settings Page">8a22c675794a4210e57223f7799a7273</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>4e22c6751d4a4210beeffedc5478d16a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4e22c6751d4a4210beeffedc5478d16a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8a22c6758d4a42108f8498288ca87a6a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Additional Details">0222c6759d4a42100530aa890de4a46b</macroponent><name>Fetch variables if catalog</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "No additional details at this time.",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var data = api.data.look_up_records_1.results;
    var finalOutput = [];
    data.forEach(function(element) {
        if (element.sc_item_option._reference.value.displayValue) {
            finalOutput.push({
                'label': element.sc_item_option._reference.item_option_new.displayValue,
                'value': {
                    'type': 'string',
                    'value': element.sc_item_option._reference.value.displayValue
                }
            });
        }
    });
    if (finalOutput != "") {
        api.setState('labelValue', finalOutput);
    } else {
        var emptylabel = await helpers.translate("No additional details at this time.");
        var emptyvalue = "";
        finalOutput.push({
            'label': emptylabel,
            'value': {
                'type': 'string',
                'value': emptyvalue
            }
        });
        api.setState('labelValue', finalOutput);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>8a22c6758d4a42108f8498288ca87a6a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch variables if catalog</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8a22c6758d4a42108f8498288ca87a6a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(task)">0622c675984a4210afd2780845d83d76</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>0622c6756b4a421081ce6bcd5548116d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0622c6756b4a421081ce6bcd5548116d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4622c675ee4a4210df6635948e599866
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Security & sign-in">ce22c675ce4a42102872b05f3e24e765</macroponent><name>Checking MFA setup</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var modelData = api.data.gliderecord_query_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query.sys_properties._results[0].value.value;
    var mfa = {};
    if (modelData == "false") {
        api.setState('propertyText', helpers.translateSync("Please enable Multi-factor authentication on the instance."));
        api.setState('propertyValue', true);
    } else {
        api.setState('propertyText', helpers.translateSync("Configure Multi-factor authentication by clicking the button below."));
        api.setState('propertyValue', false);
    }

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">4a22c675d64a4210f9e0ed2c5e0b6a6b</macroponent><name>Refresh submitted screen</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId,
        number
    } = api.context.props;
    if(table !== "sc_request"){
        api.setState("successNumber",number);
        api.setState("successSysId",sysId);
    }else{
        api.setState("requestSysId",sysId);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>8622c675d24a4210d9a843bd62c71a6b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh submitted screen</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8622c675d24a4210d9a843bd62c71a6b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

	current.my_string = "From business rule";

	logger.log("Business rule executed")

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">c622c675644a42108b2e8a0bdcf9926d</macroponent><name>handle_tab_filter_click</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports, helpers}) {
		const props = api.context.props;
    helpers.navigate.to('search', {
			searchTerm: props.searchTerm,
			searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId
    },
		{
			searchFilters: event.payload.selectedFilter,
			facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
			disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck
		},
		false,
    false);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>0e22c6753a4a421058a6719277cde462</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_tab_filter_click</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0e22c6753a4a421058a6719277cde462</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>Launch approve alert </name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
       const modal_payload = {
            "modalId": "[component-id$='alert_1']",
            "showModal": true,
            "displayOptions": null
        };
        const OPEN_MODAL = 'MODAL_SELECTED';
        api.emit(OPEN_MODAL, modal_payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>8e22c675754a42102161bb89c6bd706c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Launch approve alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8e22c675754a42102161bb89c6bd706c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:22</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0a22c675284a4210a0560b7097325766
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">c222c6753d4a42108a39f58123ab706e</macroponent><name>Update comments</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Comment deleted.",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Comment posted.",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let done = false;
    let itemPath = [];

    const getPath = (items, pid, level) => {
        for (let i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
            if (!done) {
                itemPath.length = level;

                if (items[i].id == pid) {
                    itemPath.push(i);
                    done = true;
                    return;
                } else {
                    if (items[i].children && items[i].children.length > 0) {
                        itemPath.push(i);
                        getPath(items[i].children, pid, level + 1);
                    }
                }
            } else return;
        }
    };

    const getStringPath = (path, key) => {
        let actualPath = "";

        for (let i = 0; i < path.length - 1; i++) {
            actualPath += `[${path[i]}].children`;
        }

        if (path.length != 0 && key)
            actualPath += `[${path[path.length - 1]}].${key}`;
        else if (path.length != 0)
            actualPath += `[${path[path.length - 1]}]`;

        return actualPath;
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.get()
     */
    const get = (obj, path) => {
        if (!path)
            return undefined;

        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        return (
            pathArray.reduce((prevObj, key) => prevObj && prevObj[key], obj)
        );
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.set()
     */
    const set = (obj, path, value) => {
        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        pathArray.reduce((acc, key, i) => {
            if (acc[key] === undefined) acc[key] = {};
            if (i === pathArray.length - 1) acc[key] = value;
            return acc[key];
        }, obj);
    };

    /**
     * Alternative method to lodash _.unset()
     */
    const unset = (obj, path) => {
        const pathArray = Array.isArray(path) ? path : path.match(/([^[.\]])+/g);

        pathArray.reduce((acc, key, i) => {
            if (i === pathArray.length - 1) {
                acc.splice(key, 1);
            }
            return acc[key];
        }, obj);
    };

    const put = function(obj, path, val) {
        var stringToPath = function(path) {
            if (typeof path !== 'string')
                return path;

            var output = [];

            path.split('.').forEach(function(item, index) {
                item.split(/\[([^}]+)\]/g).forEach(function(key) {
                    if (key.length > 0) {
                        output.push(key);
                    }
                });
            });

            return output;
        };

        path = stringToPath(path);

        var length = path.length;
        var current = obj;

        path.forEach(function(key, index) {
            if (index === length - 1) {
                current[key].unshift(val);
            } else {
                if (!current[key]) {
                    current[key] = {};
                }

                current = current[key];
            }
        });
    };

    if (event.elementId == 'get_article_details_1' && event.name == 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED') {
        if (api.data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails.showFeedbackComments) {
            api.setState('articleId', api.context.props.sysId);
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'retrieve_knowledge_comments' && event.name == 'DATA_FETCH_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.data.retrieve_knowledge_comments.knowledgeComments;

        if (comments) {
            api.setState('comments', comments);
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'insert_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let data = JSON.parse(event.payload.data.output.data.AppKnowledge_Mutation.addComment);

        if (data.sys_id) {
            helpers.translate('Comment posted.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "submitCommentAlert",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });

            let comment = {
                'id': data.sys_id,
                'parent': data.parent,
                'children': data.children,
                'created': data.created_on,
                'text': data.comment_text,
                'user': {
                    'name': data.user.name,
                    'id': data.user.sys_id,
                    'avatar': data.user.avatar
                },
                'reactionCount': 0,
                'isReacted': false
            };

            let comments = api.state.comments;

            if (comment.parent) {
                getPath(comments, comment.parent, 0);

                if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                    api.setState('comments', []);

                    put(comments, getStringPath(itemPath, 'children'), comment);

                    api.setState('comments', comments);
                    done = false;
                    itemPath = [];
                }
            } else {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                comments.unshift(comment);
                api.setState('comments', comments);
            }
        } else {
            helpers.translate('You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "commentLimitAlert",
                        status: "critical",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'delete_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);
            
            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let index = itemPath[0];

                if (itemPath.length <= 1) {
                    comments.splice(index, 1);
                } else {
                    unset(comments, getStringPath(itemPath, null));
                }

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }

            helpers.translate('Comment deleted.').then((value) => {
                api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                    items: [{
                        id: "deleteCommentAlert",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: value,
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    }],
                });
            });
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'like_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);

            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let path = getStringPath(itemPath, "");
                let reactionCount = get(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`);

                set(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`, reactionCount + 1);
                set(comments, `${path}.isReacted`, true);

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'unlike_knowledge_comment' && event.name == 'DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED') {
        let comments = api.state.comments;
        let currentCommentId = api.state.currentCommentId;

        if (currentCommentId != null) {
            getPath(comments, currentCommentId, 0);

            if (done && itemPath.length > 0) {
                api.setState('comments', []);
                let path = getStringPath(itemPath, "");
                let reactionCount = get(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`);

                set(comments, `${path}.reactionCount`, reactionCount - 1);
                set(comments, `${path}.isReacted`, false);

                api.setState('comments', comments);
                done = false;
                itemPath = [];
            }
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>0a22c675284a4210a0560b7097325766</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update comments</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0a22c675284a4210a0560b7097325766</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">4a22c675d64a4210f9e0ed2c5e0b6a6b</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>4a22c675dc4a4210f9d3fa4315f0fa62</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4a22c675dc4a4210f9d3fa4315f0fa62</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:22</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">c622c675644a42108b2e8a0bdcf9926d</macroponent><name>handle_pagination</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
	const props = api.context.props;
	const fields = {
		searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId,
		searchTerm: props.searchTerm
	};
	const token = event.payload.paginationToken;
	const params = {
		searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
		facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
		disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck,
		paginationToken: token
	};
	global.window.scrollTo(0, 0);
	helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>8a22c6754c4a42103383766d9baa606d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_pagination</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8a22c6754c4a42103383766d9baa606d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:22</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(request)">4222c675604a42102c9b0941cc4e5e76</macroponent><name>Set catalog Imge</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var model = {};
    var input = api.data.look_up_records_1.results[0].cat_item._reference;
    var modelData = input.picture.displayValue;
    if (modelData != undefined) {
        model.headerImage = modelData;
        model.fieldLabel = "Test value"; //Here only to support the required structure of the object
    }
    api.setState('setImage', model);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>0622c675304a421027574a1c4b44396a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set catalog Imge</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0622c675304a421027574a1c4b44396a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4622c675344a42105ef676aebe381b69
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(request)">4222c675604a42102c9b0941cc4e5e76</macroponent><name>display_value_block_1_items</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "{0}",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    var modelArray = [];
    var modelData = api.data.look_up_record_1.result;
    var table = api.state.table;
    var user = api.context.session.user.fullName;

    function block(label, type, value) {
        var out = {};
        var labelNew =  helpers.translateSync("{0}", label);
        out.label = labelNew;
        var outval = {};
        outval.type = type;
        outval.value = value;
        out.value = outval;
        return out;
    }

    function getDate(item) {
        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {
            var itemDate = new Date(item.displayValue);
            item.displayValue = [itemDate.getFullYear(), itemDate.getMonth() + 1, itemDate.getDate()].join('-');;
            return item;
        }
    }

    function addToModel(item, label) {

        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {
            modelArray.push(block(label, "string", item.displayValue));
        }
    }
    if (table === 'sc_req_item') {
        var requestedFor = api.data.look_up_record_3.result.requested_for.displayValue;
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(modelData.stage, "Stage");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        if (requestedFor != undefined && requestedFor != null && requestedFor != user) {
            modelArray.push(block("Requested for", "string", requestedFor));
        }
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
        addToModel(modelData.quantity, "Quantity");
        addToModel(modelData.price, "Price");
        var recurringPrice = modelData.recurring_price || {};
        if (recurringPrice.displayValue && recurringPrice.displayValue.substring(1) !== "0.00") {
            modelArray.push(block("Recurring price", "string", recurringPrice.displayValue));
        }
        addToModel(modelData.recurring_frequency, "Recurring frequency");
    } else if (table === 'incident') {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
        addToModel(modelData.caller_id, "Caller");
        addToModel(modelData.urgency, "Urgency");
        addToModel(modelData.cmdb_ci, "Configuration item");
        addToModel(modelData.assigned_to, "Assigned to");
    } else {
        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");
        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");
        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");
    }

    addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_created_on), "Creation date");
    addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_updated_on), "Last update");
    return modelArray;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>4622c675344a42105ef676aebe381b69</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>display_value_block_1_items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4622c675344a42105ef676aebe381b69</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8622c675d04a4210186ca006850ba468
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">ca22c6756c4a421057bbf3835b47c478</macroponent><name>Related item page redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;

    if (state.relatedItemSysId) {
        api.setState("relatedItemSysId", "");
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route: "catalog",
            fields: {
                "sysId": data.look_up_record_1.result.related_sc_cat_item.value
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>8622c675d04a4210186ca006850ba468</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Related item page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8622c675d04a4210186ca006850ba468</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">c222c6753d4a42108a39f58123ab706e</macroponent><name>Show Submit Comment Alert</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    {
        "message": "Comment posted."
    }
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[async function handler({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
        items: [{
            id: "submitCommentAlert",
            status: "info",
            icon: "info-circle-outline",
            content: await helpers.translate("Comment posted."),
            action: {
                type: "dismiss"
            }
        }],
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>ca22c6752f4a4210fcec70afc33b6969</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Submit Comment Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ca22c6752f4a4210fcec70afc33b6969</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4222c6752d4a42105ef95f63eff6a664
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">c622c675644a42108b2e8a0bdcf9926d</macroponent><name>Search result clicked</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const ACTION_NAME = event.payload.action.actionDispatch;
    var route = 'landing';
    if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE' || ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_KB_ARTICLE') {
        route = "article";
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION' && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url !== "") {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'NAVIGATION') {
        var table = event.payload.action.actionPayload.table;
        if (table == "kb_knowledge") {
            route = "article";
        } else if (table == "sc_cat_item" && event.payload.action.actionPayload.url == "") {
            route = "catalog";
        }
        const fields = {
            "sysId": event.payload.action.actionPayload.sysId
        };
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields
        });
    } else if (ACTION_NAME == 'GENIUS_NAVIGATION_CATALOG_EXTERNAL') {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            external: {
                "url": event.payload.action.actionPayload.url
            }
        });
    } else return;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>4222c6752d4a42105ef95f63eff6a664</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Search result clicked</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4222c6752d4a42105ef95f63eff6a664</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8222c6759c4a42102173c553e94a4c69
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">c222c6753d4a42108a39f58123ab706e</macroponent><name>Create knowledge feedback</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    {
        "message": "Thank you for your feedback"
    },
    {
        "message": "We'll improve the article based on your feedback."
    },
    {
        "message": "Article has been flagged"
    },
    {
        "message": "Feedback submitted."
    },
    {
        "message": "Feedback submitted."
    },
    {
        "message": "You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user."
    }
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[async function handler({
    api,
    helpers,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        context,
        data,
        state,
        setState,
        emit
    } = api;
    const {
        modal
    } = helpers;
    const insertRecord = function(table, fields, type) {
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", type);
        data.create_record_1.execute({
            table,
            templateFields: fields,
            useSetDisplayValue: ''
        });
    };
    var articleSysId = context.props.sysId;
    var templateFields = "article=" + articleSysId + "^";
    var articleData = data.get_article_details_1.articleDetails;
    var yesMessage = await helpers.translate("Thank you for your feedback");
    var noMessage = await helpers.translate("We'll improve the article based on your feedback.");
    const feedbackAction = state.currentFeedbackAction;

    if (event.elementId == "kb_star_rating") {
        setState('currentFeedbackAction', "rating");
        templateFields += "rating=" + event.payload.rating;
        if (articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForRating >= event.payload.rating) {
            setState('userRating', event.payload.rating);
            modal.open("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        } else {
            insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "rating");
        }
    }

    if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no") {
        var showModal = (articleData.showFeedbackOptions || articleData.showFeedbackComments) && articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForHelpful;
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", "boolean_feedback");
        if (showModal) {
            setState('additionalDetails', null);
            setState("selectedReason", ["4"]);
            modal.open("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        } else {
            templateFields += "useful=no";
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "boolean_feedback");
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_yes") {
        setState("currentFeedbackAction", "boolean_feedback");
        templateFields += "useful=yes";
        setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', yesMessage);
        setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-up-outline');
        setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "boolean_feedback");
        const usefulYesCount = articleData.usefulYesCount+1;
        const totalUsefulCount = articleData.totalUsefulCount+1;
        var helpPercent = (usefulYesCount && totalUsefulCount) ? 
            Math.round(usefulYesCount / totalUsefulCount *100) : 0;
        const helpPercentMessage = (helpPercent) ? helpPercent+'% found this helpful':'';
        setState('helpPercentMessage',helpPercentMessage);
        setState('isHelpPercentInfoHidden', false);
    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no_ignore") {

        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        if (feedbackAction != "rating") {
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            templateFields += "reason=4^useful=no";
        }
        if (feedbackAction == "rating") {
            templateFields += "reason=4^rating=" + state.userRating;
        }
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields,feedbackAction);

    } else if (event.elementId == "boolean_feedback_no_submit") {
        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_1']");
        if ((state.selectedReason)[0] != null)
            templateFields += "reason=" + (state.selectedReason)[0] + "^";
        if (state.additionalDetails != null)
            templateFields += "comments=" + state.additionalDetails + "^";
        if (feedbackAction != "rating") {
            setState('booleanFeedbackMessage', noMessage);
            setState('booleanFeedbackIcon', 'thumbs-down-outline');
            setState("isBooleanFeedbackButtonsHidden", true);
            templateFields += "useful=no";
        }
        if (feedbackAction == "rating") {
            templateFields += "rating=" + state.userRating;
        }
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields,feedbackAction);
    } else if (event.elementId == "flag_article") {
        modal.close("[component-id$='custom_2']");
        var comments = state.flagArticleContent.replaceAll("\n", "\\n").replaceAll("^", "^");
        templateFields += "flagged=true^comments=" + comments;
        setState('flagArticleContent', comments);
        if (articleData.enableActionableFeedbackForFlag)
            templateFields += "^reason=Flagged";
        insertRecord('kb_feedback', templateFields, "flag_article");
    }

    if (event.elementId == "create_record_1") {
        var items = [];
        var requestFailed = false;
		
        if (event.name == "DATA_OP_SUCCEEDED") {
            var output = event.payload.data.output.data.GlideRecord_Mutation.insert_kb_feedback;
            if (output == null) {
                requestFailed = true;
            } else {
                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "flag_article") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "flagArticleSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: await helpers.translate("Article has been flagged"),
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }
                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "rating") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "ratingArticleSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: await helpers.translate("Feedback submitted."),
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }

                if (state.currentFeedbackAction == "boolean_feedback") {
                    items.push({
                        id: "booleanFeedbackSuccess",
                        status: "info",
                        icon: "info-circle-outline",
                        content: await helpers.translate("Feedback submitted."),
                        action: {
                            type: "dismiss"
                        }
                    });
                }
            }
        }
        
        if (event.name == "DATA_OP_FAILED" || requestFailed) {
            items.push({
                id: "flagArticleFailure",
                status: "critical",
                icon: "info-circle-outline",
                content: await helpers.translate("You have reached the daily limit for feedback posted by a user."),
                action: {
                    type: "dismiss"
                }
            });
        }
        if (items.length > 0) {
            emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
                items
            });
        }
        setState('currentFeedbackAction', "");
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>8222c6759c4a42102173c553e94a4c69</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create knowledge feedback</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8222c6759c4a42102173c553e94a4c69</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

function evaluateProperty({

}) {

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>c222c675b04a4210fbb5c593c1e6dd68</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>breadcrumbs_1_items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c222c675b04a4210fbb5c593c1e6dd68</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0622c675a84a4210c1bb1d81eb2a8364
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">c622c675644a42108b2e8a0bdcf9926d</macroponent><name>handle_facet_click</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports, helpers}) {
		const props = api.context.props;
    helpers.navigate.to('search', {
			searchTerm: props.searchTerm,
			searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId
    },
		{
			searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
			facetFilters: event.payload.selectedFilters,
			disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck
		});
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>0622c675a84a4210c1bb1d81eb2a8364</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_facet_click</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0622c675a84a4210c1bb1d81eb2a8364</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4a22c675d14a42102469ff0d0cc1e368
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>Fetch my tasks</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Approval overdue: {0}",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Approval Request: {0}",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Approval due: {0}",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const input = api.data.evam_mytasks.compositeDataViews;
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        var currDate = new Date();
        var dueDate = new Date(model.model.due_date);
        if (model.model.due_date != "") {
            model.highlightedHeaderLabel = await helpers.translate("Approval due: {0}", dueDate);
            if (currDate.getTime() > dueDate.getTime()) {
                model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
                model.highlightedHeaderLabel =await helpers.translate("Approval overdue: {0}", dueDate);
            }
        }
        model.title = await helpers.translate("Approval Request: {0}", model.title);
        if (model.model.table == "sc_req_item") {
            if (model.model.recurring_frequency != "") {
                model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
            }
        }
        if (model.model.sys_created_on != "") {
            var createdDate = new Date(model.model.sys_created_on);
            model.detailValueOne = [createdDate.getFullYear(), createdDate.getMonth() + 1, createdDate.getDate()].join('-');
        }
    }
    api.setState('mytaskData', input);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>4a22c675d14a42102469ff0d0cc1e368</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch my tasks</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4a22c675d14a42102469ff0d0cc1e368</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">c622c675644a42108b2e8a0bdcf9926d</macroponent><name>handle_search</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
    const fields = {
        searchContextConfigId: api.context.props.searchContextConfigId
    };
    const params = {
        searchFilters: api.context.props.searchFilters
    };
    
	if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_RESULTS_CONTAINER#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = true;
        
  	} else if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_COMBOBOX#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = false;
        console.log("search clicked");
        api.setState('loading', true);
        api.setState('searchTerm', event.payload.searchTerm);
  	}
	//helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>8a22c675304a4210bf150b166d38a667</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8a22c675304a4210bf150b166d38a667</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>data_row_3_data</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "{0} out of 5",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    const input = api.data.evam_popular_articles.compositeDataViews;
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        if (model.model.rating != "") {
            model.detailValueTwo = helpers.translateSync("{0} out of 5", model.model.rating);
        }
    }
    return input;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>ca22c675f94a4210381984ec7882ce6c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>data_row_3_data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ca22c675f94a4210381984ec7882ce6c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>close modal</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     if (event.elementId == 'button_6' || event.elementId == 'button_8') { // When user clicks on Approve or reject button
        api.setState('approvalState', true);
        if (event.elementId == 'button_6') { // Approve button is clicked
            helpers.modal.close('custom_3');
        } else { // Reject button is clicked
            helpers.modal.close('custom_4');
        }
    } else if (event.elementId == 'button_5' || event.elementId == 'button_7') { // When user clicks on Cancel button from both the modals
        api.setState("cardID", event.payload.sysId);
        if(event.elementId == 'button_5'){
            helpers.modal.close('custom_3');
        }else{
          helpers.modal.close('custom_4');  
        }
    } else { // When user clicks on Close icon on modal
        if (api.state.approvalState == false) {
            api.setState("cardID", event.payload.sysId);
        } else {
            api.setState('approvalState', false);
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>0222c675aa4a4210bd5945748b05f565</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>close modal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0222c675aa4a4210bd5945748b05f565</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    return [{
            "label": helpers.translateSync("Home"),
            "icon": "home-outline",
            "hideLabel": false
        },
        {
            "label": api.data.look_up_record_1.result.number.displayValue
        }
    ];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>4222c675d64a421056ccaea50f61a36a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>breadcrumbs_1_items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4222c675d64a421056ccaea50f61a36a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8622c675a44a4210f76a54e4798a1862
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(task)">0622c675984a4210afd2780845d83d76</macroponent><name>display_value_block_1_items</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "{0}",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**

* @param {params} params

* @param {api} params.api

* @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers

*/

function evaluateProperty({

    api,

    helpers

}) {

    var modelArray = [];

    var modelData = api.data.look_up_record_1.result;

    var table = api.state.table;

    var user = api.context.session.user.fullName;

    var requestedFor = api.data.look_up_record_3.result.requested_for.displayValue;



    function block(label, type, value) {

        var out = {};

        var labelNew = helpers.translateSync("{0}", label);

        out.label = labelNew;

        var outval = {};

        outval.type = type;

        outval.value = value;

        out.value = outval;

        return out;

    }



    function getDate(item) {

        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {

            var itemDate = new Date(item.displayValue);

            item.displayValue = [itemDate.getFullYear(), itemDate.getMonth() + 1, itemDate.getDate()].join('-');;

            return item;

        }

    }



    function addToModel(item, label) {



        if (item != undefined && item.displayValue != "" && item.displayValue != null) {

            modelArray.push(block(label, "string", item.displayValue));

        }

    }
    if (table === 'sc_req_item') {

        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");

        addToModel(modelData.stage, "Stage");

        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");

        if (requestedFor != undefined && requestedFor != null && requestedFor != user) {

            modelArray.push(block("Requested for", "string", requestedFor));

        }

        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");

        addToModel(modelData.quantity, "Quantity");

        addToModel(modelData.price, "Price");

        var recurringPrice = modelData.recurring_price || {};

        if (recurringPrice.displayValue && recurringPrice.displayValue.substring(1) !== "0.00") {

            modelArray.push(block("Recurring price", "string", recurringPrice.displayValue));

        }

        addToModel(modelData.recurring_frequency, "Recurring frequency");

    } else if (table === 'incident') {

        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");

        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");

        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");

        addToModel(modelData.caller_id, "Caller");

        addToModel(modelData.urgency, "Urgency");

        addToModel(modelData.cmdb_ci, "Configuration item");

        addToModel(modelData.assigned_to, "Assigned to");

    } else {

        addToModel(modelData.state, "State");

        addToModel(getDate(modelData.due_date), "Due date");

        addToModel(modelData.number, "Request number");

    }



    addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_created_on), "Creation date");

    addToModel(getDate(modelData.sys_updated_on), "Last update");

    return modelArray;

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>8622c675a44a4210f76a54e4798a1862</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>display_value_block_1_items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8622c675a44a4210f76a54e4798a1862</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c622c675f14a4210d6b2736ccec1c164
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">c222c6753d4a42108a39f58123ab706e</macroponent><name>Toggle Comment Reaction</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, imports }) {
  var likeCommentPayload = {
    operation: {
      dataElementId: "like_knowledge_comment",
      operationName: "EXECUTE"
    },
    operationPayload: {
      commentId: event.payload.commentId,
      articleId: api.context.props.sysId
    }
  }

  var unlikeCommentPayload = {
    operation: {
      dataElementId: "unlike_knowledge_comment",
      operationName: "EXECUTE"
    },
    operationPayload: {
      commentId: event.payload.commentId,
      articleId: api.context.props.sysId
    }
  }

  if (event.payload.reaction) {
    api.emit("UXF_DB_OP_TRIGGER_REQUESTED", likeCommentPayload);
  } else {
    api.emit("UXF_DB_OP_TRIGGER_REQUESTED", unlikeCommentPayload);
  }
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>c622c675f14a4210d6b2736ccec1c164</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Toggle Comment Reaction</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c622c675f14a4210d6b2736ccec1c164</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">c222c6753d4a42108a39f58123ab706e</macroponent><name>Show Delete Comment Alert</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    {
        "message": "Comment deleted."
    }
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[async function handler({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
        items: [{
            id: "deleteCommentAlert",
            status: "info",
            icon: "info-circle-outline",
            content: await helpers.translate("Comment deleted."),
            action: {
                type: "dismiss"
            }
        }],
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>0e22c675864a4210e5296aadeaad7468</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Delete Comment Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0e22c675864a4210e5296aadeaad7468</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
