sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">c222c6753d4a42108a39f58123ab706e</macroponent><name>setAdditionalDetails</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    api.setState("additionalDetails", event.payload.value);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>8222c6759b4a4210213643f52703c063</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setAdditionalDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8222c6759b4a4210213643f52703c063</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c222c675294a42105adcbe7d80d8136b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>My task page redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    let table = "";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.value;
        let tableDisplayValue = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.displayValue;
        let tableStartsWith = tableDisplayValue.substring(0, 3);

        if (tableStartsWith == "INC") {
            table = "incident";
        }else if (tableStartsWith == "RIT") {
            table = "sc_req_item";
        } else {
            table = "task";
        }

        if (state.taskcard && sysId) {
            api.setState("taskcard", "");
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "rec_task",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId,
                    approvalId: api.state.taskcard
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>c222c675294a42105adcbe7d80d8136b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>My task page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c222c675294a42105adcbe7d80d8136b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>Set my task sysId</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    api.setState("taskcard",event.payload.sysId);  
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>0a22c675be4a4210c025a89667141a63</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set my task sysId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0a22c675be4a4210c025a89667141a63</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_4e22c675a94a4210550a947377066967
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Task rejected">0222c6758d4a42107d05dddb56ce3268</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>4e22c675a94a4210550a947377066967</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4e22c675a94a4210550a947377066967</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8e22c675684a4210a5b87eb9e783cd66
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">4a22c675d64a4210f9e0ed2c5e0b6a6b</macroponent><name>View request redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    let {
        table,
        sysId
    } = api.context.props;

    const route = "record_request";

    if (table != "sc_request") {
        table = table == "incident" ? "incident" : "task";
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else {
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table : "sc_req_item",
                sysId : api.data.look_up_records_1.results[0].sys_id.value
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>8e22c675684a4210a5b87eb9e783cd66</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>View request redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8e22c675684a4210a5b87eb9e783cd66</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">c222c6753d4a42108a39f58123ab706e</macroponent><name>setFeedbackReason</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var selectedReasons = [];
    selectedReasons.push(event.payload.item.id);
    api.setState("selectedReason", () => selectedReasons);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>0222c6757c4a42106473db1766cf0d6e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setFeedbackReason</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0222c6757c4a42106473db1766cf0d6e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:18</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8622c6759f4a421077923ef6974e796e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>Card click redirection for My requests</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        setState,
        emit
    } = api;

    const table = event.payload.table;
    const sysId = event.payload.sysId;
    const route = "record_request";

    if (table === "sc_req_item") {
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else if(table == "incident"){
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "incident",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
    else{
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "task",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>8622c6759f4a421077923ef6974e796e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Card click redirection for My requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8622c6759f4a421077923ef6974e796e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Card click redirection for My requests

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_c622c675974a4210f3858f443c6af167
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>Fetch my requests</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Completion date: {0}",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var input = api.data.evam_myrequests.compositeDataViews;
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        var currDate = new Date();
        var dueDate = new Date(model.model.due_date);
        const duedateLabel = [dueDate.getFullYear(), dueDate.getMonth() + 1, dueDate.getDate()].join('-');
        var price = model.model.price;
        if (model.model.table == "sc_req_item") {
            if (model.model.due_date != "") {
                model.highlightedHeaderLabel = await helpers.translate("Completion date: {0}", duedateLabel);
                if (currDate.getTime() > dueDate.getTime()) {
                    model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
                }
            }
            if (model.model.recurring_frequency != null)
                model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " + " + model.model.recurring_price + " " + model.model.recurring_frequency;
            if (price.substring(1) == "0.00" && model.model.recurring_frequency == null)
                model.subtitle = " ";
        } else {
            if (model.model.due_date != "") {
                model.highlightedHeaderLabel = await helpers.translate("Completion date: {0}", duedateLabel);
                if (currDate.getTime() > dueDate.getTime()) {
                    model.highlightedHeaderBkgColor = "critical";
                }
            }
        }
    }
    api.setState('requestData', input);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>c622c675974a4210f3858f443c6af167</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch my requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c622c675974a4210f3858f443c6af167</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>Refresh landing</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    if(event.payload.name !== 'refresh'){
        return;
    }
    api.data.evam_mytasks.refresh();
    api.data.evam_myrequests.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_1.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_2.refresh();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>0e22c6756b4a421064894964c25f516b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh landing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0e22c6756b4a421064894964c25f516b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(request)">4222c675604a42102c9b0941cc4e5e76</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>8222c675864a4210ee8077cc3d6b356c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8222c675864a4210ee8077cc3d6b356c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:22</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Settings Page">8a22c675794a4210e57223f7799a7273</macroponent><name>breadcrumbs_1_items</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Home",
  "comment" : ""
}, {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Settings",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    return [{
            "label": helpers.translateSync("Home"),
            "icon": "home-outline",
            "hideLabel": false
        },
        {
            "label": helpers.translateSync("Settings")
        }
    ];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>c222c675064a4210b4c4de975d166b62</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>breadcrumbs_1_items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c222c675064a4210b4c4de975d166b62</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:19</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    const label = helpers.translateSync("Reference Number : ")
    return `${label} ${api.state.successNumber}`;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>0a22c6756d4a421048a2b1dbf200ba69</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>confirmation_message_1_caption</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0a22c6756d4a421048a2b1dbf200ba69</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">0622c675414a42104940dae7e6556d79</macroponent><name>On search </name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {

    const {
        searchContextConfigId,
        searchTerm
    } = event.payload;
    
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route: "search",
        fields: {
            searchContextConfigId
        },
        params: {
            searchTerm
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>4e22c675784a4210e504a33104a87e6d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>On search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4e22c675784a4210e504a33104a87e6d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page(task)">0622c675984a4210afd2780845d83d76</macroponent><name>record_header_1/headerImageItem</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    if (api.context.props.table == 'sc_req_item') {
        return {
            headerImage: api.data.look_up_record_2.result.picture.displayValue,
            fieldLabel: "Test value" //Here only to support the required structure of the object
        }
    } else {
        return "";
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>8e22c675174a421099c3446d165f7363</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>record_header_1/headerImageItem</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8e22c675174a421099c3446d165f7363</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_0622c6757a4a42109cd385e560885f67
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Additional details">4222c6751b4a42106f2add91d8152767</macroponent><name>Fetch catalog item details</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : "",
  "message" : "No additional details at this time.",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
async function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var data = api.data.look_up_records_1.results;
    var finalOutput = [];
    data.forEach(function(element) {
        if (element.sc_item_option._reference.value.displayValue) {
            finalOutput.push({
                'label': element.sc_item_option._reference.item_option_new.displayValue,
                'value': {
                    'type': 'string',
                    'value': element.sc_item_option._reference.value.displayValue
                }
            });
        }
    });
    if (finalOutput != "") {
        api.setState('labelValue', finalOutput);
    } else {
        var emptylabel = await helpers.translate("No additional details at this time.");
        var emptyvalue = "";
        finalOutput.push({
            'label': emptylabel,
            'value': {
                'type': 'string',
                'value': emptyvalue
            }
        });
        api.setState('labelValue', finalOutput);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>0622c6757a4a42109cd385e560885f67</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch catalog item details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0622c6757a4a42109cd385e560885f67</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:22</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ux_client_script_8a22c675144a4210b394cd95730ed464
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Catalog Item Page">ca22c6756c4a421057bbf3835b47c478</macroponent><name>fetch related catalog items info</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var input = api.data.evam_data_resource_1.compositeDataViews;
    var result = [];
    var filterOutRecords = api.data.look_up_records_1.results.map((element) => {
        return element.sys_id.value;
    });
    for (var i = 0; i < input.items.length; i++) {
        var model = input.items[i].propValues;
        if (filterOutRecords.indexOf(model.model.sys_id) != -1) {
            if (model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"] != null)
                model.subtitle = model.subtitle + " with " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_price"] + " " + model.model["related_sc_cat_item.recurring_frequency"];
            result.push(input.items[i]);
        }
    }
    input.items = result;
    api.setState('relatedCatalogItems', input);
    if (input.items.length > 0) {
        api.setState('rowVisibility', false);
    } else {
        api.setState('rowVisibility', true);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>8a22c675144a4210b394cd95730ed464</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetch related catalog items info</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Playground" source="x_31018_playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Playground">85c7cebc93f73510dcc7bc2efaba10a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8a22c675144a4210b394cd95730ed464</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 10:31:21</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
